# General

  * **Type:** - Matrix Analysis
  * **Heading:** - Misc. (Analysis)
  * **Source code:** [SelectRowsManually.cs](https://github.com/JurgenCox/perseus-plugins/blob/master/PerseusPluginLib/Manual/SelectRowsManually.cs)

# Brief description

Rows can be selected interactively and a new matrix can be produced which contains only the selected rows or only the unselected rows.
